title: Refrigerator, Arched Skyline Viewing Windows, Dishwasher
posting_body: ['Whether you’re in LA or DTLA, the 1 and 2 bedroom apartments at Broadway Palace Apartments offer exceptional views inside and out.', 'These apartments provide skyline city views  accompanied by beautifully lush landscaped courtyards.', 'Whether you want to spend your time relaxing by the pool, having a glass of wine on your private patio, recuperating with some TLC in the calming steam room, or singing to your heart’s content in the Karaoke Party Lounge, the Broadway Palace Apartments will become not only your home but your own private resort.', 'These luxurious one and two bedroom apartments are available in both LA and Downtown LA.', 'APARTMENT FEATURES', '-Private Balconies and Patios with Furniture', '-Soaking Baths', '-Washer/Dryer In Unit', '-Built-in Microwave', '-Stainless Steel Sink with Pull-out Faucet', '-Wood Laminate Flooring', '-All', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', '-Satellite', 'Ready', '-Arched Skyline Viewing Windows', '-Spectacular Skyline Views Available *', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'WEBSITE', '<URL>', 'ADDRESS', '1026 S Broadway, Los Angeles, CA 90015', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.', 'Jewelry District,
